id: Weekly Planner: Plan Meals, Workout, Budget, Work
name: Weekly Planner: Plan Meals, Workout, Budget, Work
description: Welcome to the only home page you'll ever need—a fully customizable Notion template designed to help you take control of your life, all in one place. Whether you're tracking daily habits, planning your weekly meals, staying on top of your fitness goals, managing your budget, or organizing your work tasks, this template has you covered.For the past two years, I’ve personally used this home page as my central hub for life planning, and it’s transformed the way I organize my week.
